title: Noam Chomsky on The Necessary Pain of Facing Unpleasant Truths
description:
A wide-ranging conversation with renowned public intellectual  Noam Chomsky. Chomsky speaks about his early political activism, the necessity of confronting painful truths about the world around us, and the immense challenges that face humanity today.
